title: What is your today's technology advice? - Quora

response.answer_text: My technology advice is regarding privacy and security. Nowadays there are more cyber attacks and crimes that we are facing. So to avoid those attacks use your smartphone and laptops for limited purpose and follow the tips and tricks to be safe and not to be a victim of cyber attacks Some of the tips that i knew and i follow are: Passwords: Never use/set same password for different types of social media accounts like instagram, Facebook, twitter etc.. as if one account is hacked then all the other accounts can be easily accessible. Use strong passwords containing Uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters in it.Disable or uninstall the app that you doesn't use more. Because as you are not using it more often there would be a chance that you willnot notice an attack if it is from your usually unused app.Never open an unknown link as there might the phishing attack that can be performed.Read terms and conditions as well as keep an eye on permissions you are giving to an app or website. Try to avoid giving permissions to unnecessary websites/apps.If you are concerned about privacy then never backup your whatsapp chat to google drive as google drive backup doesn't follow encryption.Use two factor authentication for signing in to your accounts like gmail, Facebook, Instagram and so on..Give high priority to the browsers which is giving privacy ex: Duckduckgo, Tor etc..Keep an eye on the background activities of your mobile, if you notice any suspicious activity then immediately take action against it. There are number of solutions we can find in Google.Learn about the types of attacks those are which a hacker can perform and be cautious about those attacks.Prevent opening of unnecessary ads, websites, links, apps, etc..Use stickers or any other small hacks to close or avoid camera and microphone when not in use.Avoid using public/free wifi.Neve save your personal information or payment or credit/debit card information or any other passwords in your mobile or in any websites or apps.Make sure you have cleared your information after use in transaction with third party.Avoid sharing your details to strangers over calls. 100% of time there are fake or fraud calls.And there are many more to avoid cyber attacks on us. These tricks are those which i personally use in day to day Life. This tips will take just less than a minute to follow which leads you to be a happy person and avoids you attacked by hackers . Thank you 😊 Happy reading…..
